## Crime Rates by Moon Phases

```{r rickshaw, cache=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis', comment=NA}
# library(knitr)
# opts_chunk$set(comment = NA, results = "asis", tidy = F)
library(rCharts)
library(dplyr)
if (!exists("crimes.by_day")) {
    load("../data/crimes.RData")
} 
if (!exists("crimes.by_yearmonth")) {
    crimes.by_yearmonth <- crimes.by_day %>%
        #mutate(ym = as.POSIXct(paste(year, month, "01", sep = "-"))) %>%
        mutate(ym = as.numeric(as.POSIXct(paste(year, month, "01", sep = "-")))) %>%
        group_by(ym, moon) %>%
        summarize(cnt = sum(cnt)) %>%
        filter(!is.na(ym))    
}

options(RCHART_TEMPLATE = 'Rickshaw.html')
t <- "line"
p2 <- Rickshaw$new()
p2$layer(cnt ~ ym, group = "moon", data = crimes.by_yearmonth, type = t,
         colors = c("#e41a1c", "#377eb8", "#4daf4a", "#984ea3"))
p2$set(slider = TRUE,
       height = 300)
#p2$show('inline', include_assets = TRUE, cdn = TRUE)
p2$show('iframe', cdn = TRUE)
#p2$save('rs.html', cdn = TRUE)
#cat('<iframe src="rs.html" width=100%, height=600></iframe>')

```
